        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var houseHoldPlugin = GlidePluginManager.isActive(global.CSMBaseConstants.HOUSEHOLD_PLUGIN);
    var serviceOrganizationPlugin = GlidePluginManager.isActive(global.CSMBaseConstants.SERVICE_ORGANIZATION_PLUGIN);

    if (current.account.nil() && gs.nil(current.service_organization) && current.consumer.nil() && gs.nil(current.household)) {
        current.setAbortAction(true);
        var msg = 'account or a consumer';
        if (serviceOrganizationPlugin) {
            if (houseHoldPlugin)
                msg = 'account, consumer, household or service organization';
            else
                msg = 'account, consumer or service organization';
        } else if (houseHoldPlugin)
            msg = 'account, consumer or household';
        gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Add an {0} to the install base item.", msg));
    } else if (!current.account.nil() && !current.consumer.nil() && !GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.sn_csm_b2b_consumers')) {
        gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Cannot select multiple entities; select either an account or a consumer.'));
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    } else if (houseHoldPlugin ||
        serviceOrganizationPlugin) {
        var account = !gs.nil(current.account);
        var contact = !gs.nil(current.contact);
        var consumer = !gs.nil(current.consumer);
        var serviceOrg = serviceOrganizationPlugin && !gs.nil(current.service_organization);
        var household = houseHoldPlugin && !gs.nil(current.household);
        var errorFlag = false,
            errmsg = "";
        if (serviceOrg) {
            if (account || contact) {
                errorFlag = true;
                errmsg = "an account or service organization";
            } else if (consumer) {
                errorFlag = true;
                errmsg = "a consumer or service organization";
            } else if (household) {
                errorFlag = true;
                errmsg = "a household or service organization";
            }
        } else if (household) {
            if (account || contact) {
                errorFlag = true;
                errmsg = "an account or household";
            } else if (serviceOrg) {
                errorFlag = true;
                errmsg = "a service organization or household";
            }
        }
        if (errorFlag) {
            current.setAbortAction(true);
            gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Cannot select multiple entities; select either {0}.", errmsg));
        }
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script>
